review.comment: These guys can't be beat. They can do about anything you want.  Ask Them to show you some of the cool custom work they have done in the past!
I received top notch service from Chip and the folks at Optical in the manufacturing of my new LP. I couldn't have been happier with the communication, timeliness and deliverables.
review.review_reply: Thanks, Nate! You made such an awesome recording!  Gnarly Ebow performance and all! Thanks for choosing Indy Vinyl Pressing!  Chip and The IVP Team
